Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sigh_00>That's right. It was a stocky animal that
was wider than a horse and had strange
horns. But not like a cow's or goat's!
Oh, and it had tusks that made the beast
look like a little brute!

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Trouble_01>I saw the animal once in the <clr:0000>forest<clr:ffff> off to
the east. I rushed closer to get a good
look, but it ran off by the time I got there.
I'd never seen anything like it. I must say,
the whole experience was shocking.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Some travelers passed through here from
<clr:0000>Lakeside Stable<clr:ffff> and said they'd seen a
similar animal.
So maybe I'll find it again somewhere!
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A <clr:0000>strange animal<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> The <clr:0000>sound of a flute<clr:ffff>
nearby...<sp:5:1:0> Really, there's so much to be
worried about these days.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Ease>Uhhh... <sp:5:0:0>I have to make sure I don't catch
a ch-ch-chill.
Talk1011:

too, not like a cow's or goat's.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>There were travelers who came from
<clr:0000>Lakeside Stable<clr:ffff> and they said they'd

So maybe I'll find it again somewhere!
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>And did you, perchance, find out where
the <clr:0000>sound of a flute<clr:ffff> is coming from?
Talk1001:

Have you, perchance, seen a rather

Have you seen a rather <clr:0000>strange animal<clr:ffff>

0001: I think it was a Dondon.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal>I wonder if you've happened to see it...
That <clr:0000>strange animal<clr:ffff>...
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Oh, hello. Mind if I ask you something?


Have you, perchance, seen a rather
<clr:0000>strange animal <clr:ffff>around here?

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>It was a stocky creature, wider than a
horse. Strange little horns too, but not
like a cow's or goat's.
There were travelers who came from
<clr:0000>Lakeside Stable<clr:ffff> and they said they'd
seen a creature like it.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Admiration_01>Oh, I didn't know there were animals
called Dondons!

<sp:3:0:2:0501>Quite a bouncy bit of a name they have!
Dondon...<sp:5:0:0> Dondon...<sp:5:0:0> I could say that all
day, and maybe I will. <sp:5:0:0>Dondon...
So, Princess Zelda rescued those
creatures and asked Lakeside
Stable to take care of them...
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration_00>Princess Zelda is very kind.


The stable isn't that far away, so it might
be interesting to see those creatures.

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Trouble_01>I'm tempted to bring them something,
but what might Dondons enjoy?

Dondon...<sp:5:0:0> Dondon...<sp:5:1:0> Dondon!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_01>Oh, I see.<sp:5:0:0> That's a shame.


<sp:3:0:2:0501>The sight of that strange animal is going
to really trouble my thoughts.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>Dondon... Dondon... Oh, what a bouncy
name those animals have.

So, they're under Princess Zelda's
protection and are being cared for at
Lakeside Stable...<sp:5:0:0> 
If you happen to go there to see them for
yourself, take something with you that
they might enjoy.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>But what might a Dondon...<sp:5:0:0>Dondon...<sp:5:0:0>
Dondon...<sp:5:0:0>like to eat?
Talk2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, I just remembered... While thinking of
that strange animal, I was walking through
the <clr:0000>trees on the north side of the stable<clr:ffff>.
Out of nowhere, I could hear someone
playing a fun tune on a <clr:0000>flute<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>But I couldn't see who it was! Not even
the slightest sign of this mysterious
musician. Who was playing? And where?
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Also, I've heard the <clr:0000>sound of a
flute <clr:ffff>somewhere...<sp:5:0:0>

It's vexing, really. Not knowing where
that's coming from.
